import React from "react"; import { getProductinfoById } from "../../selectors/getInfoById"; const PrintBill = (props) => { const { user, products, customers, bill } = props const getTotal = () => { const result = bill.lineItems.reduce((previousValue, currentValue) => { return previousValue + currentValue.subTotal }, 0) return result } const getProductinfoById = (id, productData) => { const result = productData.find((product) => { return product._id === id }) return result } return (
{user.businessName}
{user.address}
Email: {user.email}

Customer name: {customers.name}

Mobile: {customers.mobile}

Date: {bills.date.slice(0, 10)}

{ bills.lineItems.map((lineItem, i) => { return ( ) }) }
Sl.No. Particulars MRP Qty Subtotal
{i + 1} {getProductinfoById(lineItem.product, productInfo).name} {lineItem.price} {lineItem.quantity} {lineItem.subTotal}
Total {getTotal()}
) } export default PrintBill
